name: Eco Park
description:
Eco Park is a game about ecology and lo-fi hip-hop. Manage a dynamic ecosystem with creatures eating, breeding, and dying in real time. You’ll need to introduce species to increase biodiversity. Keep population sizes under control, or one species might extinguish another.

features:

> Nine levels, each a resource management challenge
> Each level is a puzzle to solve: understand the ecosystem and how to control it
> Let species flourish, while keeping others under control so they don't wipe out their own food source

Other details:

> Single player campaign
